entry.title: Bitcoin Core 0.12.0 release candidate 1 available
entry.summary: The context of the conversation is about a feature that had a limitation which the speaker wants to know if it has been lifted. The response confirms that the said limitation has indeed been lifted. The speaker recommends advertising the change in the new release notes as the disk space reduction is significant. It is mentioned that the idea was added by Marco Falke in commit fa31133.
